mapper.select: select t.category,sum(case t.category when ${@com.gnet.app.revenueandrefund.RevenueAndRefund@TYPE_CATEGORY_REFUND} then -payment else payment end) amount from ykj_revenue_and_refund t where t.order_id = #{orderId} group by t.category

select t.pay_way,sum(case t.category when ${@com.gnet.app.revenueandrefund.RevenueAndRefund@TYPE_CATEGORY_REFUND} then -payment else payment end) amount from ykj_revenue_and_refund t where t.order_id = #{orderId} group by t.pay_way

select t.category,t.pay_way,sum(case t.category when ${@com.gnet.app.revenueandrefund.RevenueAndRefund@TYPE_CATEGORY_REFUND} then -payment else payment end) amount from ykj_revenue_and_refund t where t.order_id = #{orderId} group by t.pay_way,t.category
